Posts.EditableText: I am developing a free roam text adventure game. But it will not be as based when the player makes a decision the story line changes instead the story line will be made by the player. He will make the objectives, goals, etc. More details will be released if you message me about the game. I am looking for people to help. Please comment your email or phone number and I will get with you. Also please comment what you would be able to do for developing.

Posts.EditableText:
If it is in Quest, I can give you idea, and develop them, 
but I'm not up to speed on Quest programming...yet.
But I do know Basic, and can guide you from that perspective...
(And adventure games in general!)
